attributes.action: Publish "the science" with a detailed explanation for Covid restrictions
attributes.additional_details: We the public continue to be told that the continued infringement on our lives and liberties is due to "following the science".  An array of contradicting opinions from experts. Is it more deadly than we are treating it or less? We would like to see this in the interest of full clarity.  We all want to do what is right for the greater good, and public anxiety, depression, and anger can be mitigated if we can all see and have explained to us the information the government is basing its decisions.
attributes.background: We would like the government to publish "the science" along with a detailed explanation upon which continued Covid restrictions are being made.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332460

The Government Office for Science has published the minutes from the Scientific Advisory Group for Emergencies (SAGE) meetings. You can find the latest minutes here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/sage-meetings-december-2020
